overview: Lukas travels alone to the city in search of some excitement.  He  hooks up with Tobias at the station and has fantastic sex with him back at his apartment, then learns he can make lots of money doing what he does best.  Lukas does some sightseeing and finds the hustler bar. His eyes are opened to a whole new world. Watch as handsome young men explore each other for pay and sometimes for free. A stunning cast of well-hung Czech and Slovak models makes this an instant Man’s Best classic. These studs bust nut after ball-draining nut. Come experience all the sexual joys found …in the city!
title: In the City
